page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANDREW
page.content: {June 18th 1985.}I get up and listen to the news, U.S. plane been hijacked in Beirut, car bomb,74 people killed and England won the 1st test match against Australia. Get to school at 9.0 a.m . 8 lessons all together but they're really terrible because we get too much work. I like Music and Maths because they are very easy and German until the teacher freaks. Dinner hour is not too bad because we can do sports if we want to or go down to town. Get home at 4.20 change from school uniform which consists of a black blazer, trousers, shoes , a grey shirt and school tie. Watch T.V. and saw Minder which is ace and a couple of other programmes. Also watched 9.0 o'clock news. Plane still hijacked. Then went to bed. { ANDREW THOMAS AGED 13
